name: Vegetarian Green Curry with Tofu and Vegetables
ingredients: 1 block (14 oz) extra-firm tofu, pressed and cubed
2 tbsp green curry paste (store-bought or homemade)
instructions: Heat the vegetable oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat.
Add the cubed tofu and cook until golden brown on all sides. Remove the tofu and set aside.
Add the green curry paste to the pot and cook, stirring constantly, for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Pour in the coconut milk and vegetable broth. Bring to a simmer.
Stir in the soy sauce and brown sugar until dissolved.
Add the red bell pepper, broccoli florets, green beans, and snow peas. Simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
Return the cooked tofu to the pot.
Stir in the kaffir lime leaves and Thai basil. Simmer for another minute.
Taste and adjust seasoning as needed. Add more soy sauce for saltiness or brown sugar for sweetness.
Serve hot with cooked jasmine rice.
